name: 2021 International Conference on Interactive Design, Architecture and Engineering （ICIDAE 2021）
content: 2021 International Conference on Interactive Design, Architecture and Engineering （ICIDAE 2021） will be held in Suzhou, China during March 17-19, 2021\. It brings together leading academic scientists, researchers and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of interactive design, architecture and engineering. Prof. Nuno Dinis Corticos from Universidade de Lisboa, Portugal, and Prof. Nobuo MISHIMA from Faculty of Science and Engineering, Saga University, Japan will give keynote speach. All the registered and presented papers will be published in the volume of IOP- Materials Science and Engineering (MSE): Conference Series, which will be submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec, and other databases for review and indexing. Submission Deadline Before Feb 15, 2021 Notification of Acceptance On March 1, 2021 Registration Deadline Before March 10, 2021 Conference Dates On March 17-19, 2021 Paper submission: 1.Conference Submission System: https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/ICIDAE2021 2.Mail: icidae@isaeri.org Conference Secretary: Ms. Alice Li Tell: +852-30756685 Mail: icidae@isaeri.org Conference website: www.icidae.org
